item.title: Teach a child to program
item.description: This is my first post ever on this blog, and so I believe it makes sense to start at the very beginning of my journey into computer programming. The year was 1995, and I was 8 years old. My younger brother and I spent most of our time playing Sega Genesis games, as well as a handful of games (on 5-1/4-inch floppy disks) on an old Apple //c my Dad had picked up at a garage sale.
